name: Interference (luchikill)
description:
This is a First Person Shooter game, you invade a mysterious alien space ship, but after 10 seconds you realize that you're
stranded and hordes of aliens attack you. Would you survive 10 rounds?

http://bit.ly/Interference_Youtube_Gameplay

-Interference Web Page: http://bit.ly/Interference_WebPage

-Also you can check the game on itch.io: http://bit.ly/itch_io_Interference

-Let me know what you think down in the comments or in this link:
http://bit.ly/RoastMyGame_Interference

This game was made following the instructions of the book: "Blueprints Visual Scripting for Unreal Engine" by Brendan Sewell. The assets used are property of Unreal Engine, most of this assets were imported from the Content Example and Infiltrator Demo. The final result and esthetic of the game is from my work.

This is a Learning Project Game. It is not intended to gain any incomes.

Contact: lgm.gamedev@outlook.com ; lgm.gamedev@gmail.com
